website_summaries.verdict: All-leather construction ensures this well-priced striking bag will last for you.
pros: Contains two bags connected in the middle, so you can work on both upper and lower strike targets
Ships with rubber cables so you can hang it and start working out immediately
Bag is well-balanced so you'll receive good feedback on the accuracy of your strikes during sessions
cons: Cannot adjust the length of the cables to accommodate different ceiling heights

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great bag, I love Location the location of the air holes. Plus it doesn’t leak much air.
customer_reviews.author: corey johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well made, and sturdy. Aesthetically, it is nice to look at. It takes a punch well, and it is balanced. Delivery time was better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: Good for working on hooks and up and down work
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. You can throw more variety of punches and combos than on a regular double end bag. Make sure you pump up bags all the way for best results.
customer_reviews.author: IQ

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag!  No leaks
customer_reviews.text: Great quality... I have used this bag for a month and a half now and love it. Keeps the air and and does not leak at all. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RSPerry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. I agree with other reviewers about the bladder valves jutting out. Not a big problem though. This is a good alternative to a heavy bag setup in an apartment. Not a replacement as it obviously feels very different. But, it's a lot of fun. My setup includes hanging the bag from a door frame mount pull up bar, and a weight bag to hold it down. Works well and easy to move out of the way. At some point I will attempt to hook it up to the ceiling. That way I could probably get kicks in as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abe G

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i say is that the straps for the top and the botom vary per room i was lucky and found one around the house to use but you may need to go buy some to fit your rooms needs and your needs.Then dont worry about the things were you put the air in they will not get in your way if you now how to actually hit the bag
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: nice double-double end bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality bag. The leather is nice and looks solid. I used few times, however, got it for my 5 years old. I love the bag, he loves it as well. I purchased extra bends at the same time when i was buying the bag, however, the bag already came with a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Volkov

customer_reviews.title: One of my personal favorites items from ringside....
customer_reviews.text: One of the better products Ringside has to offer. Definitely worth the price. The construction is excellent. The stitching is close to perfect and it's extremely durable. I've owned mine for 5 years now it's still looks like new. (Knock on wood). Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: This double end bag is exactly what I was looking for. The rubber straps are strong an flexible. The high quaity leather that is covered with will last for a long time. And the idea of having two targets to heat instead of one, is great (double effort). I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for home gyms
customer_reviews.text: Love it after a month and a half it stills feels like quality!
customer_reviews.author: vern

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really like my Double end bag. Only concerned I had was I had to trim the inflation needle holes, they were a little long and would scuff my gloves, besides that it has medium rebound to work on combinations.
customer_reviews.author: A DuB

customer_reviews.title: Ringside Mexican-style Top and Bottom/Double End Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Not my first double end, but definitely my favorite! Well made, and the locking rings on the cables are a nice addition. The ability to train head-body combos on this bag is essential, although the larger size of the bag prevents it from being as mobile (ie hard to hit) as a single double end bag. One problem I've had with other bags is that they gradually lose air over a few rounds and you need to pump them up every 20 minutes or so. Not so with this bag! This bag is well-worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: On time, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: decent quality, I'm not all that familiar with boxing gear so difficult to compare with other options. I would recommend some type of gloves to use with . Purchased for 6yr old and 8 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag when the bladders hold up.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bag but unfortunately the top bladder only lasted a couple months of light use. I contacted Ringside and did not hear back :(
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I have my doubts about the quality of this product,
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheaply made, bungee cords blow, do yourself a gigantic favor and purchase a better bag , remember you are buying this to pummel
customer_reviews.author: Dunking Darrell G. DeWitt III

product_meta.title: Ringside Mexican-Style Double-Double End Bag
product_meta.description: The sleek Mexican-style is great for teaching head-body combinations. This unique design allows the user to vary his/her targets. Comes complete with two rubber cables.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
